description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Listed Building Consent ref. no. P/2013/5410, dated 28.03.2014 for 'Demolition of infill extension (between Pitzhanger Manor and  Gallery) front portico and rear eating room extension; internal and external alterations to Pitzhanger Manor and the Gallery; provision of rear greenhouse conservatory and provision of roof lantern to Pizhanger Manor; provision of enlarged basement areas to Gallery;and erection of new detached cafe / events building in walled gardens (Listed Building Consent)' Variation to allow for provision of WC and associated services within basement room B7, and retention of proposed WC in first floor room F8 (Amendment to Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

2	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings 	565/SK153, dated June 2016, 565/SK154, dated June 2016, 565/SK155, dated June 2016, 565/SK156A, dated June 2016, 565/SK157A, dated June 2016, 565/SK158, dated June 2016.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
3	All external materials to be used in the shall be those as listed within the documents submitted with this planning application.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h)(j), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).

4	Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy 7C of the adopted
